name: Neant
text: With things back to normal, you decide to regain hope and try your luck again.

name: Neant
text: The beast, for her part, has retreated from these lands, having given up hope of getting your attention.

name: Neant
text: Alas, you may never meet such devoted friend again !

name: Neant
text: Monstrous on the outside, yet big-hearted on the inside, our dearest Rosie shall find her happiness too, sooner or later...
